title: Hell Week
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about how Patton broke his, John Wayne in Searchers, and the art of perfecting accents. Have something interesting you'd like to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave us a message at speak pipe.com/didyougetmytext.

Stay motivated while having fun with bike workouts, yoga, meditation, dance cardio and more. Visit onepeloton.com to learn more.

Feeling is believing. Upgrade to everyday pieces that love your body as much as you do. Right now you can get 20% off your first order at thirdlove.com/text.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
